projects.name: Breakout Clone(ish)
projects.description: A clone of the game Breakout that was created during my time at Lambda School during a Sprint Challenge. Sprint Challenges at Lambda School are done in three hours on a Friday morning - this is the result of what I was able to do during that time.

projects.name: Wizard School Sorting Hat Quiz
projects.description: Welcome to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry! Answer these six questions to be sorted into your house!

projects.name: Database for Cohort Lectures at Lambda School
projects.description: As section lead of the UX cohort, I discovered a need to have lecture videos all in one repository that students could access. This is a result of that idea. The idea is to be able to have students access an account profile and change their passwords if they want to. As is, we have a central account that students use to access videos - they can create an account if they would like, but there is no way to update credentials yet.

projects.name: Lambda Notes
projects.description: My very first full-stack application completed during my time as a student at Lambda School. It's elementary, for sure, but it's something I'm super proud of after having come from a background with no programming experience.
